resources.string: Oops. Entrada has crashed. Please wait while we generate an error report...
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
(Optional) What were you doing when the crash occurred?
There are local changes. Please sync before deleting all jobs.
PIN codes must be between 4-10 digits in length
Would you like to save changes to this job?
Audio Recording was Stopped. \n10 Minute limit reached
Do Not Upload Changes to Server
Your dictation will be uploaded shortly.
Or search for a patient below:
There are local changes. Please sync before deleting all jobs
DO YOU HAVE A CLINIC CODE?
I Do Not Have a Clinic Code
DO YOU HAVE A DEMO ACCOUNT?
Are you sure you want to delete this account?
Entrada requires atleast one account at all times. You must create a new account before deleting this account
Please sync all completed and held jobs before editing your queues.
Please wait for sync to complete before editing your queues.
The previous recording session was interrupted. It has been restored and ready to be resumed.
All jobs must include audio to send. If you are sending a picture only, record at least 5 seconds of blank audio. You may also put this job on hold and save.
Secure Image Capture is not currently enabled for your group. Please contact your Entrada Account Manager to learn more about this feature.
You need to accept our terms and conditions inorder to use Secure Messaging. Check your intenet connection and try again
Are you sure you want to delete

This End User License Agreement (“Agreement”) is a binding agreement between you (“Licensee” or “you”) and Entrada, Inc. (“Entrada”). This Agreement governs your use of the [NAME OF APP] (including all related documentation, the “App”), a software application for use by health care professionals via mobile devices, tablet computers and similar devices (each a “Device”)1, and the services provided by Entrada through and/or in connection with the App (the “Services”). The App is licensed, not sold, to you.
\n BY CLICKING THE “AGREE” BUTTON1 OR ACCESSING OR USING THE APP, YOU (A) ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THIS AGREEMENT; (B) REPRESENT THAT YOU ARE OF LEGAL AGE TO ENTER INTO A BINDING AGREEMENT; AND (C) ACCEPT THIS AGREEMENT AND AGREE THAT YOU ARE LEGALLY BOUND BY ITS TERMS. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, THEN YOU HAVE NO RIGHT TO, AND SHALL NOT, ACCESS OR USE THE APP.
Definitions. (a)“Collective Content” means, collectively, Entrada Content and Registered User Content. (b)“Content” means text, graphics, images, software (excluding the App), audio, video, information or other materials. (c)“Entrada Content” means Content that Entrada makes available through the App or the Services, including any Content licensed from a third party, but excluding Registered User Content. (d)“Other User Content” means Content that another Registered User posts, uploads, publishes, submits or transmits to be made available through the App or the Services. (e)“Registered User” means a person that completes Entrada’s account registration process, as described in Section 2 (Account Registration) below. (f)“Registered User Content” means Your Content and Other User Content. (g)“Your Content” means Content that you post, upload, publish, submit or transmit to be made available through the App or the Services.1 Account Registration. (h)Access to and use of the App and the Services is limited to healthcare professionals [who are United States residents working in the United States]2 and at least 18 years of age. You must register to create an account (“Account”) and become a Registered User to use the App or the Services. You can register via the App. To register, you must provide your full name, the name of the healthcare institution where you work and/or are affiliated (the “Indicated Entity”), your email address and other information specified in the registration form (“Registration Data”). By registering, and in consideration of the use of the App and/or the Services, you represent and warrant: (i) the Registration Data that you provide about yourself is true, accurate, current and complete; (ii) you are a healthcare professional; (iii) you are at least 18 years of age; and (iv) you will maintain and promptly update the Registration Data to keep it true, accurate, current and complete. You authorize Entrada to confirm the truthfulness and accuracy of the Registration Data. If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, or if Entrada has reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, Entrada has the right to suspend or terminate your Account and refuse any and all current or future use of the App and the Services. You also authorize Entrada to access your contact list and/or address book on your Device in order to provide and use the App and the Services.
(a)Use of the App and the Services is void where prohibited by law or by any Indicated Entity or otherwise. By using the App and/or the Services, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority and capacity to agree to and abide by these Terms and that you are not prohibited from using the Services. You understand that your use of the App and/or the Services may involve or require the transmission of significant amounts of data. You are responsible for all data charges that may be charged by your wireless carrier or internet service provider or that may otherwise arise from your use of the App and/or the Services. (b)You understand and agree that the Services may include certain communications from Entrada, such as service announcements and administrative messages, and that these communications are considered part of Entrada membership and you will not be able to opt out of receiving them. Security. Users are required to provide a valid, working email address and password to access and use the App and the Services. Upon registering, you will receive a password, which you will be required to change from time to time. Certain other Content, features or functionalities within the Services may require additional access codes. Your email address and the password and codes assigned to you are, collectively, your “Credentials.” You shall (1) maintain the strict confidentiality of your Credentials, (2) not allow another person to use your Credentials to access the App or the Services, (3) any and all damages or losses that may be incurred or suffered as a result of any activities that occur under your Credentials. You agree to immediately notify Entrada in writing by email to [security@entradahealth.com] of any unauthorized use of your Credentials or any other breach of security. Entrada is not and shall not be liable for any harm arising from or relating to the theft of your Credentials, your disclosure of your Credentials, or the use of your Credentials by another person or entity. Any attempt to obtain unauthorized access or to exceed authorized access to the App, Services or Collective Content shall be considered a trespass and computer fraud and abuse, punishable under state and federal laws. Entrada hereby notifies you that any or all communications with the App may be monitored, captured, recorded and transmitted to the authorities as deemed necessary by Entrada in its sole discretion and without further notice. Patient Data and Legal Compliance.1 (c)State and federal laws, as well as ethical and licensure requirements of your profession may impose obligations with respect to patient confidentiality that may limit the ability of physicians, health care providers and persons acting on their behalf, to make use of certain confidential patient information (“Patient Information”) and/or to transmit Patient Information to third parties. (d)You represent and warrant that you will, at all times, comply with all laws directly or indirectly applicable to you that may now or hereafter govern the gathering, use, transmission, processing, receipt, reporting, disclosure, maintenance and storage of the Patient Information, and use your best efforts to cause all persons or entities under your direction or control to comply with such laws. You are at all times solely responsible for obtaining and maintaining all patient consents, if applicable, and all other legally necessary consents or permissions required or advisable to disclose, process, retrieve, transmit, and view the Patient Information that you transmit, store or receive in connection with the App, the Services or any third-party site. (e)WE CANNOT AND DO NOT ASSUME ANY RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR USE OR MISUSE OF PATIENT INFORMATION OR OTHER INFORMATION TRANSMITTED, MONITORED, STORED OR RECEIVED WHILE USING THE APP OR THE SERVICES. WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO AMEND OR DELETE ANY COLLECTIVE CONTENT THAT IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION VIOLATES THE ABOVE. (f)You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for all Your Content. Accordingly, you represent and warrant that: (i) you either are the sole and exclusive owner of all Your Content or otherwise have all rights, licenses, consents and releases that are necessary to grant to Entrada the rights in Your Content as contemplated under this Agreement; and (ii) neither Your Content nor your posting, uploading, publication, submission or transmittal of Your Content or Entrada’s use of Your Content (or any portion thereof) on, through or by means of the App or the Services will infringe, misappropriate or violate a third party’s patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret, moral rights or other intellectual property rights, or rights of publicity or privacy, or result in the violation of any applicable law or regulation, including, but not limited to, the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health (HITECH) Act, and any relevant State privacy laws. License Grant. Subject to the terms of this Agreement and your compliance therewith, Company grants you a limited, non-exclusive and nontransferable license to: (g)download, install and use the App for your use, solely in connection with the provision of healthcare services, on a single Device strictly in accordance with the App’s documentation; and (h)view, download and use on such Device the Entrada Content, the Other User Content that you are permitted to access and the Services made available in or otherwise accessible through the App, strictly in accordance with this Agreement. No licenses or rights are granted to you by implication or otherwise under any intellectual property rights owned or controlled by Entrada or its licensors, except for the licenses and rights expressly granted in this Section 5. Restrictions. Licensee shall not: (i)use, copy, adapt, modify, prepare derivative works based upon, distribute, license, sell, transfer, publicly display, publicly perform, transmit, stream, broadcast or otherwise exploit the App or the Services, except as expressly permitted in this Agreement; (j)reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, decode or otherwise attempt to derive or gain access to the source code of the App or any part thereof; (k)remove, delete, alter or obscure any trademarks or any copyright, trademark, patent or other intellectual property or proprietary rights notices from the App or the Entrada Content, including any copy thereof; (l)rent, lease, lend, sell, sublicense, assign, distribute, publish, transfer or otherwise make available the App or any features or functionality of the App, to any third party for any reason, including by making the App available on a network where it is capable of being accessed by more than one Device at any time; (m)remove, disable, circumvent or otherwise create or implement any workaround to any copy protection, rights management or security features in or protecting the App or the Collective Content; (n)post, upload, publish, submit or transmit or otherwise make available any Content that you do not have a right to make available under any law or under contractual or fiduciary relationships; (o)post, upload, publish, submit or transmit any Content that: (i) infringes, misappropriates or violates a third party’s patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret, moral or other intellectual property rights, or rights of publicity or privacy; (ii) violates, or encourages any conduct that would violate, any applicable law or regulation or would give rise to civil liability; (iii) is fraudulent, false, misleading or deceptive; (iv) is defamatory, obscene, pornographic, vulgar or offensive; (v) promotes discrimination, bigotry, racism, hatred, harassment or harm against any individual or group; (vi) is violent or threatening or promotes violence or actions that are threatening to any person or entity; or (vii) promotes illegal or harmful activities or substances; (p)access, tamper with, or use non-public areas of the App, Entrada’s computer systems, or the technical delivery systems of Entrada’s providers; (q)attempt to probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of any Entrada system or network or breach any security or authentication measures; (r)attempt to access or search the App, Services or Collective Content or download Collective Content from App or the Services through the use of any engine, software, tool, agent, device or mechanism (including spiders, robots, crawlers, data mining tools or the like) other than the software and/or search agents provided by Entrada; (s)send any unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, email, junk mail, spam, chain letters or other form of solicitation, from the App or otherwise; (t)use any meta tags or other hidden text or metadata utilizing a Entrada trademark, logo URL or product name without Entrada’s express written consent; (u)use the App, Services or Collective Content for any commercial purpose or the benefit of any third party or in any manner not permitted by this Agreement; (v)forge any TCP/IP packet header or any part of the header information in any email or newsgroup posting, or in any way use the App or the Services to send altered, deceptive or false source-identifying information; (w)interfere with, or attempt to interfere with, the access of any user, host or network, including, without limitation, sending a virus, overloading, flooding, spamming, or mail-bombing the App or the Services; (x)collect or store any personally identifiable information from the App or the Services from other users of the App or the Services without their express permission; (y)impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity; (z)violate any applicable law or regulation; or (aa)encourage or enable any other individual to do any of the foregoing. Entrada may investigate and prosecute violations of any of the above to the fullest extent of the law and involve and cooperate with law enforcement authorities in prosecuting users who violate this Agreement. You acknowledge that Entrada has no obligation to monitor your access to or use of the App or the Services or to review or edit any Collective Content, but has the right to do so for the purpose of operating the App and the Services, to ensure your compliance with this Agreement or to comply with applicable law or the order or requirement of a court, administrative agency or other governmental body. Entrada reserves the right, at any time and without prior notice, to remove or disable access to any Collective Content that Entrada, at its sole discretion, considers to be in violation of this Agreement or otherwise harmful to the App or the Services. Reservation of Rights. You acknowledge and agree that the App is provided under license, and not sold, to you. You do not acquire any ownership interest in the App under this Agreement, or any other rights thereto other than to use the App in accordance with the license granted, and subject to all terms, conditions and restrictions, under this Agreement. The App, Services and Entrada Content are protected by copyright, trademark and other laws of the United States and foreign countries. You acknowledge and agree that the App, Services and Entrada Content, including all associated intellectual property rights, are the exclusive property of Entrada and its licensors. Use of Your Content; Collection and Use of Your Information. Licensee shall not: (bb)You provide Entrada access to, and hereby authorize Entrada to use, Your Content to provide the Services. (cc)You acknowledge that when you download, install or use the App, Company may use automatic means (including, for example, cookies and web beacons) to collect information about your Device and about your use of the App. You also will be required to provide Registration Data as a condition to using the App. All information we collect through or in connection with this App is subject to our Privacy Policy [INSERT AS LINK TO MOBILE APP PRIVACY POLICY]2. By downloading, installing, using and providing information to or through this App, you consent to all actions taken by us with respect to your information in compliance with the Privacy Policy. Feedback. Entrada welcomes and encourages you to provide feedback, comments and suggestions for improvements to the App or the Services (“Feedback”). You may submit Feedback by emailing Entrada at [feedback@entradahealth.com]. You acknowledge and agree that if you submit any Feedback to Entrada, you hereby grant to Entrada a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, fully-paid, royalty-free, sub-licensable and transferable license under any and all intellectual property rights that you own or control to use, copy, modify, create derivative works based upon and otherwise exploit the Feedback for any purpose. Updates. Entrada may from time to time in its sole discretion develop and provide App updates, which may include upgrades, bug fixes, patches and other error corrections and/or new features (collectively, including related documentation, “Updates”). Updates may also modify or delete in their entirety certain features and functionality. You agree that Entrada has no obligation to provide any Updates or to continue to provide or enable any particular features or functionality. Based on your Device settings, when your Device is connected to the internet either: (dd)the App will automatically download and install all available Updates; or (ee)you may receive notice of or be prompted to download and install available Updates. You shall promptly download and install all Updates and acknowledge and agree that the App or portions thereof may not properly operate should you fail to do so. You further agree that all Updates will be deemed part of the App and be subject to all terms and conditions of this Agreement. Third-Party Materials. The App may display, include or make available third-party Content or provide links to third-party websites or services (“Third-Party Materials”). You acknowledge and agree that Entrada is not responsible for Third-Party Materials, including their accuracy, completeness, timeliness, validity, copyright compliance, legality, decency, quality or any other aspect thereof. Entrada does not assume and will not have any liability or responsibility to you or any other person or entity for any Third-Party Materials. Third-Party Materials and links thereto are provided solely as a convenience to you and you access and use them at entirely at your own risk and subject to such third parties’ terms and conditions. Term and Termination. (ff)The term of Agreement commences when you acknowledge your acceptance and will continue in effect until terminated by you or Entrada as set forth in this Section 12. (gg)You may terminate this Agreement by deleting the App and all copies thereof from your Device. (hh)Entrada may terminate this Agreement at any time without notice. In addition, this Agreement will terminate immediately and automatically without any notice if you violate any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. (ii)Upon termination: (i)all rights granted to you under this Agreement will also terminate; and (ii)you must cease all use of the App and delete all copies of the App from your Device and account. (jj)Sections 1 (Definitions), 4 (Patient Data and Legal Compliance), 6 (Restrictions), 7 (Reservation of Rights), 9 (Feedback), 11 (Third-Party Materials), 13 (Disclaimers), 14 (Limitation of Liability), 15 (Indemnification), 17 (Severability), 18 (Third-Party Beneficiary), 19 (Governing Law), 20 (Limitation of Time to File Claims), 21 (Entire Agreement), 22 (Waiver) and this Section 12 shall survive the termination of this Agreement. Termination will not limit any of Company’s rights or remedies at law or in equity. Disclaimers. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THE APP AND THE SERVICES ARE NOT DESIGNED, INTENDED OR AUTHORIZED FOR USE IN HAZARDOUS OR MISSION-CRITICAL CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR USES REQUIRING FAIL-SAFE PERFORMANCE, OR WHERE FAILURE COULD LEAD TO DEATH OR PERSONAL INJURY. YOU SHALL NOT USE THE APP OR THE SERVICES FOR SUCH PURPOSES OR UNDER SUCH CIRCUMSTANCES. YOUR RELIANCE UPON THE CONTENT OBTAINED OR USED BY YOU THROUGH THE APP OR THE SERVICES IS SOLELY AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE APP IS PROVIDED TO LICENSEE “AS IS” AND WITH ALL FAULTS AND DEFECTS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW, ENTRADA, ON ITS OWN BEHALF AND ON BEHALF OF ITS AFFILIATES AND ITS AND THEIR RESPECTIVE LICENSORS AND SERVICE PROVIDERS, EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, WITH RESPECT TO THE APP, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND WARRANTIES THAT MAY ARISE OUT OF COURSE OF DEALING, COURSE OF PERFORMANCE, USAGE OR TRADE PRACTICE. WITHOUT LIMITATION TO THE FOREGOING, COMPANY PROVIDES NO WARRANTY OR UNDERTAKING, AND MAKES NO REPRESENTATION OF ANY KIND THAT THE APP WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, ACHIEVE ANY INTENDED RESULTS, BE COMPATIBLE OR WORK WITH ANY OTHER SOFTWARE, APPLICATIONS, SYSTEMS OR SERVICES, OPERATE WITHOUT INTERRUPTION, MEET ANY PERFORMANCE OR RELIABILITY STANDARDS OR BE ERROR FREE OR THAT ANY ERRORS OR DEFECTS CAN OR WILL BE CORRECTED. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF OR LIMITATIONS ON IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR THE LIMITATIONS ON THE APPLICABLE STATUTORY RIGHTS OF A CONSUMER, SO SOME OR ALL OF THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. Limitation of Liability. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT WILL ENTRADA OR ITS AFFILIATES, OR ANY OF ITS OR THEIR RESPECTIVE LICENSORS OR SERVICE PROVIDERS, HAVE ANY LIABILITY ARISING FROM OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE THE APP OR THE CONTENT AND SERVICES FOR: (kk)PERSONAL INJURY, PROPERTY DAMAGE, LOST PROFITS, COST OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES, LOSS OF DATA, LOSS OF GOODWILL, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, COMPUTER FAILURE OR MALFUNCTION OR ANY OTHER CONSEQUENTIAL, INCIDENTAL, INDIRECT, EXEMPLARY, SPECIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES; OR (ll)DIRECT DAMAGES IN AMOUNTS THAT IN THE AGGREGATE EXCEED [ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS ($100) / THE AMOUNT ACTUALLY PAID BY YOU FOR THE APP]3. THE FOREGOING LIMITATIONS ARE FUNDAMENTAL ELEMENTS OF THE BASIS OF THE BARGAIN BETWEEN ENTRADA AND YOU AND WILL APPLY WHETHER ANY SUCH DAMAGES ARISE OUT OF BREACH OF CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE) OR OTHERWISE AND REGARDLESS OF WHETHER SUCH DAMAGES WERE FORESEEABLE OR COMPANY WAS ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW CERTAIN LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY SO SOME OR ALL OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. Indemnification. You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Entrada and its officers, directors, employees, agents, affiliates, successors and assigns from and against any and all losses, damages, liabilities, deficiencies, claims, actions, judgments, settlements, interest, awards, penalties, fines, costs, or expenses of whatever kind, including attorneys’ fees, arising from or relating to your use or misuse of the App or the Services or your breach of this Agreement. Furthermore, you agree that Entrada assumes no responsibility for the content you submit or make available through this App. Export Regulation. The App may be subject to U.S. export control laws, including the U.S. Export Administration Act and its associated regulations. You shall not, directly or indirectly, export, re-export or release the App to, or make the App accessible from, any jurisdiction or country to which export, re-export or release is prohibited by law, rule or regulation. You shall comply with all applicable federal laws, regulations and rules, and complete all required undertakings (including obtaining any necessary export license or other governmental approval), prior to exporting, re-exporting, releasing or otherwise making the App available outside the U.S. Severability. If any provision of this Agreement is illegal or unenforceable under applicable law, the remainder of the provision will be deemed amended to achieve as closely as possible the effect of the original term and all other provisions of this Agreement will continue in full force and effect. Third-Party Beneficiary. If you acquire the App through the Apple/iTunes App Store and/or use the App on an Apple Device, Apple, Inc. and its subsidiaries (collectively, “Apple”) shall be third-party beneficiaries of this Agreement, and Apple shall have the right (and shall be deemed to have accepted the right) to enforce this Agreement against you as a third-party beneficiary hereof. Governing Law. This Agreement is governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of the State of Tennessee without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision or rule. [Any legal suit, action or proceeding arising out of or related to this Agreement or the App shall be instituted exclusively in the federal courts of the United States or the courts of the State of Tennessee in each case located in Nashville, Tennessee. You waive any and all objections to the exercise of jurisdiction over you by such courts and to venue in such courts.]4 Limitation of Time to File Claims. ANY CAUSE OF ACTION OR CLAIM YOU MAY HAVE ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE APP MUST BE COMMENCED WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION ACCRUES, OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION OR CLAIM IS PERMANENTLY BARRED. Entire Agreement. This Agreement [and our Privacy Policy] constitute the entire agreement between you and Company with respect to the App and supersede all prior or contemporaneous understandings and agreements, whether written or oral, with respect to the App. Waiver. No failure to exercise, and no delay in exercising, on the part of either party, any right or any power hereunder shall operate as a waiver thereof, nor shall any single or partial exercise of any right or power hereunder preclude further exercise of that or any other right hereunder. In the event of a conflict between this Agreement and any applicable purchase or other terms, the terms of this Agreement shall govern. Contact. If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact Entrada at Entrada, Inc., 5410 Maryland Way, Suite 400, Brentwood, TN 37027, or by email at [support@entradahealth.com].
